DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive rituximab IV day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 . Patients achieve clinical response last 4 month may receive second course rituximab . Patients follow 5 , 6 , 8 , 12 week , 6 9 month .
